CaveCarrotCrop.Description: Adds a crop for growing cave carrots

DaffodilCrop.Description: Adds a crop for growing daffodils

DandelionCrop.Description: Adds a crop for growing dandelions

LeekCrop.Description: Adds a crop for growing leeks

WildHorseradishCrop.Description: Adds a crop for growing wild horseradishes

FiddleheadFernCrop.Description: Adds a crop for growing fiddlehead ferns

SnowYamCrop.Description: Adds a crop for growing snow yams

WinterRootCrop.Description: Adds a crop for growing winter roots

SeaweedCrop.Description: Adds a water crop for growing seaweed

RedMushroomPlanter.Description: Adds a 'bush' crop for growing red mushrooms

PurpleMushroomPlanter.Description: Adds a 'bush' crop for growing purple mushrooms

MagmaCapPlanter.Description: Adds a late-game 'bush' crop for growing Magma Caps

SpiceBerryBush.Description: Adds a bush crop for growing spice berries

CrystalFruitBush.Description: Adds a bush crop for growing crystal fruit

WildPlumTree.Description: Adds a fruit tree for wild plum

DaffodilStyle.Description: Choose the look of daffodils between Vanilla Forage Crop style or keep the vanilla look

DandelionStyle.Description: Choose the look of dandelions between Vanilla Forage Crop style or keep the vanilla look

AlgaeTankStyle.Description: Choose the look of the Algae Tank, between original or medieval

DaffodilFlower.Description: Changes the daffodil's category from forage to flower. This allows for daffodil Honey and to be affected by the Tiller profession

DandelionFlower.Description: Changes the dandelion's category from forage to flower. This allows for dandelion honey and to be affected by the Tiller profession

LeekVegetable.Description: Changes the leek's category from forage to vegetable. This will change some gift tastes and makes Leeks affected by the Tiller profession

SnowYamVegetable.Description: Changes the snow yams's category from forage to vegetable. This will change some gift tastes and makes snow yams affected by the Tiller profession

SpringOnionVegetable.Description: Changes the spring onion's category from forage to vegetable. This will change some gift tastes and makes Spring Onions affected by the Tiller profession

WildHorseradishVegetable.Description: Changes the wild horseradish's category from forage to vegetable. This will change some gift tastes and makes Wild Horseradish affected by the Tiller profession
